bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Frederick L. Rath, Jr., March 3, 1952

div1.p: Hench writes that he enjoyed meeting with Rath and General Grant.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Frederick L. Rath, Jr., March 3, 1952
div1.opener:
March 3, 1952
Mr. Frederick L. Rath, Jr.
Director
National Council for Historic Sites and Buildings
712 Jackson Place, N.W.
Washington 6, D. C.
My dear Mr. Rath:
div1.p:
I enjoyed very much our luncheon and meeting
and it was a pleasure to meet General Grant
even though for such a short time.

I shall not write to Senora Rojas and Senorita
Cabrera until you send me the copy of your
letter and then I will write to them hinting that
you might be available for a quick visit to
Havana the week of April 28.
div1.closer: Sincerely yours, P. S. Hench, M.D. PSH:alc
